8.name: SMILE FOOT Mask
8.description:
Pamper your feet and get silky soft skin with the Smile Foot masks. So easy to use, they allow you to relax while they nourish and hydrate your feet's damaged skin.
Contains 2 single-use foot mask.

9.name: SMILE FOOT Peeling Mask
9.description:
A unique, innovative foot scrub!
Get feet that look rejuvenated after the first use! Simply put the masks on like socks and enjoy a spa-like treatment at home.

10.name: Body bomba - Lemon Verbena
10.description: A rich, oil-based body lotion powered by the refreshing lemon verbena, a refreshing herb that invigorates while comfrey leaf helps hydrate dull, depleted skin for instantly glowy, smoother-looking skin. Innovative oil in emulsion technology allows for quicker drying time while locking in moisture.

11.name: Body bomba - Ylang Ylang
11.description: A rich, oil-based body lotion powered by the refreshing lemon verbena, a refreshing herb that invigorates while comfrey leaf helps hydrate dull, depleted skin for instantly glowy, smoother-looking skin. Innovative oil in emulsion technology allows for quicker drying time while locking in moisture.
